# handle(_:client:)

**Instance Method**

Handles key down and mouse events.

## Declaration

```swift
func handle(_ event: NSEvent!, client sender: Any!) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **event**: The event to handle.
- **sender**: The client object sending the event.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if the event is handled; otherwise [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO].
title: handle(_:client:)
